battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player

Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player.Player
      • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player.Computer

  • public class Computer
extends Player
    A computer player class that inherits the abstract Player class. This player is the users rival in the game and uses a series of calculations and randomness to place ships and choose user's game table's squares to bomb.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio
